name: Aurora Horribilis
description: The Aurora Horribilis is a large aberration that possesses a unique and terrifying appearance, characterized by its incorporeal nature and chaotic essence. It lacks a defined physical form, enabling it to confuse and evade attacks.
memorable: Its Reality Adjacent ability allows it to avoid damage and confound attackers, while its Void Song can charm and confuse multiple foes, making it a strategic nightmare.
goals: The Aurora Horribilis typically seeks to manipulate and confuse its enemies, often causing chaos within combat and reveling in the discord it creates.
relations: This creature may have ties to other aberrations or chaotic entities, potentially serving as a guardian or enforcer for more powerful beings.
environment: It is found in areas of acute reality distortion or chaotic magical influences, often lurking in places inaccessible to traditional creatures.
strengths: It has numerous immunities to cold, psychic, and radiant damage, along with a unique movement trait that allows it to pass through objects.
weaknesses: The Aurora Horribilis is vulnerable to force damage, taking double damage from such attacks.
attacks: It can deliver blistering touch attacks that inflict both cold and radiant damage, making it versatile against various defenses.
most_powerful_ability: Void Song, a dissonant melody capable of charming those who hear it, can create confusion effects and long-term madness.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without relying on light or physical sight.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics and Performance, both of which it excels at due to its high Dexterity and Charisma.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement allows passing through objects, but ends with damage if it remains within one.
Reality Adjacent trait provides substantial defensive capabilities against damage and attacks.
Charmed targets of the Void Song may suffer additional madness effects based on duration.
Creatures with truesight can negate some advantages of the Aurora Horribilis.
Has a high Charisma score, aiding in deceptive or manipulative tactics.
